General.Name: Archer Materials Limited
General.Description: Archer Materials Limited, a technology company, engages in development and commercialization of semiconductor devices, and processor chips related to quantum computing and medical diagnostics in Australia. It primarily focuses on the development of qubit processor chip, that operates at room temperature and integrate into modern electronics; and graphene-based lab-on-a-chip biochip technology. The company was formerly known as Archer Exploration Limited and changed its name to Archer Materials Limited in October 2019. Archer Materials Limited was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Adelaide, Australia.
